original_title: 男はつらいよ 寅次郎夕焼け小焼け
overview: Tora-san arrives in Shibamata on Mitsuo's first day of school only to find that on his account, Mitsuo was embarrassed.  After a fight with his family, he goes to a bar to drink, then brings home a surly old man with a sad story, whose identity will surprise everyone.  Later, Tora meets Botan, a geisha.
title: Tora-san's Sunrise and Sunset
